main.title: CHUNITHM Record Viewer
loading.error.serviceDown:
CHUNITHM-NET service is currently unavailable.
Please come back later.
loading.error.rejected:
Oops! It seems that your CHUNITHM-NET just went dead.
It's probably because you opened it somewhere else.
Reload the page, re-login CHUNITHM-NET
or re-run the bookmarklet might help...
loading.error.timeout:
Oh no! Looks like we've lost connection with Houston.
You probably have accidentally navigated the original CHUNITHM-NET page to somewhere else.
Please re-open CHUNITHM-NET and run the bookmarklet again.
Remember not to throw away the original page again!
loading.error.noopener:
Looks like you are at the wrong place!
To use the record viewer, please properly
open CHUNITHM-NET and run the bookmarklet.
Last but not least, make sure you clicked the button,
rather than opening a new tab via mid-click, etc.

If you've actually just accidentally closed the original CHUNITHM-NET page, rather than going the wrong way,
please close this page, and then try it all over again.
Don't close it again this time!
loading.error.unknown:
Ughhh... We got some happy accident.
Please screenshot or copy the error message to the author,
and hopefully he will figure it out.
header.title.dl: Save or share B40 as image
settings.main.title: Settings
settings.filter.title: Filter
settings.filter.diff.notify: *Filtering difficulties might cause the "Best 30" data to be inaccurate.
settings.data.title: Game Data
settings.data.playcount.notify: *You can click the dark box beside a song to view its play count
settings.data.diffUpdate: Score Diff Basis Update Interval Last updated: {{date}}
settings.data.diffUpdate.notify: *If set to auto-update, when it has been more than the specified duration from the last time updated, the program will automatically update it.
settings.data.overpower.notify:
*It will also show unplayed song when toggled to "Show Over Power".
*Total over power might differ from the official one, if some of the songs are not unlocked yet.
settings.ui.title: User Interface
record.head.title: Title
record.fetch.error:
Some error occured when fetching best record!
You probably need to reload the page now.
playcount.fetch.error:
Some error occured when fetching play count!
You probably need to reload the page now.
share.error:
Something went wrong when converting your scores to PNG. Please screenshot the error message to the author.

{{error}}
